Headline: Actress Sandrine Pinna learnt to fire a gun for Trinity Of Shadows series, Entertainment News & Top Stories - The Straits Times
Text: Read 3 articles daily and stand to win ST rewards, including the ST News Tablet worth $398.Spin the wheel for ST Read and Win now.SINGAPORE - Early in mystery thriller Trinity Of Shadows, Taiwanese actress Sandrine Pinna raids a private party, roughly pushing a young man against the wall and yelling at partygoers. It is a huge departure for the usually elegant half-French beauty.The 34-year-old star (Touch Of The Light, 2012) went through three months of physical training with Taipei police for her first major Taiwanese drama role in eight years.
